name: viirs_ntl_annual_v21_avg_masked
title: Annual VIIRS Nighttime Lights v2.1 - Average Value
description: Annual VIIRS nighttime lights product Version 2.1. Average value with background pixels masked. Please use in combination with VIIRS Nighttime Light Cloud Free Coverage product to confirm sufficient cloud free measurements are available within your boundary features.

extract_types_info.max: maximum value measured within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average value measured  within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum value measured  within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.sum: sum of values measured within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: C. D. Elvidge, M. Zhizhin, T. Ghosh, F-C. Hsu, Annual time series of global VIIRS nighttime lights derived from monthly averages: 2012 to 2019, Remote Sensing
extras.sources_name: Earth Observation Group - VIIRS Nighttime Lights
